00069 class PheromoneMatrix : protected Matrix<double> {
00070   protected:
00071     double evaporation_rate_;
00072     double initial_pheromone_;

00074     PheromoneMatrix(int vertices, double evaporation_rate, double initial_pheromone);
00075     virtual ~PheromoneMatrix() {}
00076     double get(unsigned int v, unsigned int w);
00077     virtual void add(unsigned int v, unsigned int w, double amount);
00078     virtual void evaporate(unsigned int v, unsigned int w);
00079     void evaporate_all();
00080     double get_evaporation_rate();
00081     unsigned int size();
00082     double lambda_branching_factor(unsigned int v, double lambda);
00083     double average_lambda_branching_factor(double lambda);
00084 };

00246 class AntColonyConfiguration {
00247   public:
00248     enum LocalSearchType { LS_NONE, LS_ITERATION_BEST, LS_ALL };
00249

00253     double alpha;
00255     double beta;
00257     double evaporation_rate;
00259     double initial_pheromone;
00261     LocalSearchType local_search;
00262 
00263     AntColonyConfiguration();

00319 template<class T=Ant, class P=PheromoneMatrix> class AntColony {
00320   private:
00321     void construct_ants_solutions() {
00322       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00323         T &ant = (*it);
00324         ant.construct_solution(*problem_, *pheromones_, alpha_, beta_);
00325       }
00326     }
00327 
00328     void apply_local_search() {
00329       ants_->sort();
00330       if(local_search_type_ == AntColonyConfiguration::LS_ITERATION_BEST) {
00331         typename std::list<T>::iterator it_best = ants_->begin();
00332         (*it_best).apply_local_search(*problem_);
00333       } else if(local_search_type_ == AntColonyConfiguration::LS_ALL) {
00334         for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00335           T &ant = (*it);
00336           ant.apply_local_search(*problem_);
00337         }
00338       }
00339     }
00340 
00341     void reset_ants() {
00342       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00343         it->reset();
00344       }
00345     }
00346 
00347     void update_best_tours_no_ls() {
00348       ants_->sort();
00349       (*best_iteration_no_ls_) = ants_->front();
00350       if(best_so_far_no_ls_->get_tour_length() > best_iteration_no_ls_->get_tour_length()) {
00351         (*best_so_far_no_ls_) = (*best_iteration_no_ls_);
00352       }
00353     }
00354 
00355     void update_best_tours() {
00356       ants_->sort();
00357       (*best_iteration_) = ants_->front();
00358       if(best_so_far_->get_tour_length() > best_iteration_->get_tour_length()) {
00359         (*best_so_far_) = (*best_iteration_);
00360       }
00361     }
00362 
00363     double compute_variation_coefficient() {
00364       double average = 0.0;
00365       double standard_deviation = 0.0;
00366       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00367         average += it->get_tour_length();
00368       }
00369       average = average / ants_->size();
00370 
00371       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00372         standard_deviation += pow(it->get_tour_length() - average, 2);
00373       }
00374       standard_deviation *= 1.0 / ants_->size();
00375       standard_deviation = sqrt(standard_deviation);
00376       return standard_deviation / average;
00377     }
00378 
00379     double compute_lambda_branching_factor() {
00380       return pheromones_->average_lambda_branching_factor(0.05);
00381     }
00382 
00383     virtual void update_pheromones() = 0;
00384   protected:
00385     P *pheromones_;
00386     double alpha_;
00387     double beta_;
00388     AntColonyConfiguration::LocalSearchType local_search_type_;
00389     std::list<T> *ants_;
00390     OptimizationProblem *problem_;
00391     T *best_so_far_;
00392     T *best_iteration_;
00393     T *best_so_far_no_ls_;
00394     T *best_iteration_no_ls_;
00395 
00396   public:
00397     AntColony(OptimizationProblem *problem, const AntColonyConfiguration &config) {
00398       problem_ = problem;
00399       ants_ = new std::list<T>(config.number_of_ants, T(problem->get_max_tour_size()));
00400       pheromones_ = new P(problem->number_of_vertices()+1, config.evaporation_rate, config.initial_pheromone);
00401       alpha_ = config.alpha;
00402       beta_ = config.beta;
00403       local_search_type_ = config.local_search;
00404       best_so_far_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00405       best_iteration_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00406       best_so_far_no_ls_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00407       best_iteration_no_ls_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00408     }
00409 
00410     virtual ~AntColony() {
00411       delete problem_;
00412       delete ants_;
00413       delete pheromones_;
00414       delete best_so_far_;
00415       delete best_iteration_;
00416       delete best_so_far_no_ls_;
00417       delete best_iteration_no_ls_;
00418     };
00419 
00420     void run() {
00421       reset_ants();
00422       construct_ants_solutions();
00423       update_best_tours_no_ls();
00424       apply_local_search();
00425       update_best_tours();
00426       update_pheromones();
00427     }
00428 
00429     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour() {
00430       return best_so_far_->get_vertices();
00431     }
00432 
00433     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour_in_iteration() {
00434       return best_iteration_->get_vertices();
00435     }
00436 
00437     double get_best_tour_length() {
00438       return best_so_far_->get_tour_length();
00439     }
00440 
00441     double get_best_tour_length_in_iteration() {
00442       return best_iteration_->get_tour_length();
00443     }
00444 
00445     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour_no_ls() {
00446       return best_so_far_no_ls_->get_vertices();
00447     }
00448 
00449     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour_in_iteration_no_ls() {
00450       return best_iteration_no_ls_->get_vertices();
00451     }
00452 
00453     double get_best_tour_length_no_ls() {
00454       return best_so_far_no_ls_->get_tour_length();
00455     }
00456 
00457     double get_best_tour_length_in_iteration_no_ls() {
00458       return best_iteration_no_ls_->get_tour_length();
00459     }
00460 
00461     double get_variation_coefficient() {
00462       return compute_variation_coefficient();
00463     }
00464 
00465     double get_lambda_branching_factor() {
00466       return compute_lambda_branching_factor();
00467     }
00468 };
